alert.note: Alert for Spencer (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 4:43AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Gusty South Winds Expected Late Tonight through Saturday Morning... A strong low pressure system will lift through central Missouri tonight as strong high pressure remains in place over the eastern seaboard. A tight pressure gradient will set up across the area, allowing sustained south winds of 15 to 25 mph to develop with gusts approaching 40 to 45 mph late tonight into early Saturday morning. Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. The gusty south winds can make driving difficult for high profile vehicles, especially on east-west oriented roadways.
